monogr.title: The Gospels in the Muslim and Christian Exegetical Discourse from the Eighth to the Fourteenth Century: A Thematic and Chronological Study of Muslim and Christian (Syriac and Arabic) Sources of the Crucial Period in the History of the Development of Arab Christianity

body.bibl: Accad, Martin. “The Gospels in the Muslim and Christian Exegetical Discourse from the Eighth to the Fourteenth Century: A Thematic and Chronological Study of Muslim and Christian (Syriac and Arabic) Sources of the Crucial Period in the History of the Development of Arab Christianity.” Ph.D. dissertation, Oxford University, 2001.
